faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to common questions below

faqReviewMode.question: How do I connect my social media accounts?
faqReviewMode.answer: Go to "Connect Accounts" in the sidebar, then click on the platform you want to connect (TikTok, Instagram, or YouTube). You'll be redirected to authorize access through the official platform login.

faqReviewMode.question: What analytics can I see after connecting?
faqReviewMode.answer: Once connected, you can view your video performance metrics including views, likes, comments, and follower growth. Our AI provides personalized insights to help improve your content strategy.

faqReviewMode.question: Is my data secure?
faqReviewMode.answer: Yes! We use official platform APIs with OAuth authentication. We only access your public profile and video statistics. We never post on your behalf or access private messages.

faqReviewMode.question: Can I disconnect my accounts?
faqReviewMode.answer: Yes, you can disconnect any linked account at any time from the "Connect Accounts" page. Your data will be removed from our system.

faqFullMode.question: How do I generate an AI script from a trending video?
faqFullMode.answer: Simply click on any trending video and select "Generate AI Script". Our AI will analyze the video and create a unique script tailored to your brand and tone.

faqFullMode.question: What data sources does ViralTrend AI use?
faqFullMode.answer: We use TikTok's official API through RapidAPI, combined with our proprietary AI analysis engine that processes engagement patterns, viral elements, and trend data.

faqFullMode.question: How accurate are the viral predictions?
faqFullMode.answer: Our viral prediction algorithm has an 85% accuracy rate based on historical data, analyzing factors like engagement velocity, hashtag growth, and content patterns.

faqFullMode.question: Can I track multiple competitors?
faqFullMode.answer: Yes! Pro users can track up to 20 competitors, monitor their top-performing content, and receive alerts when they post viral videos.

faqFullMode.question: Is there a limit on AI script generation?
faqFullMode.answer: Free users get 10 AI scripts per month. Pro users enjoy unlimited script generation with advanced customization options.

faqFullMode.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqFullMode.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime from the Settings > Billing page. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.
